H

HarvestAction - Class in game
Special action for Farmer and Player to harvest ripe crops.
HarvestAction(int, int, GameMap) - Constructor for class game.HarvestAction
Constructor.
HarvestBehaviour - Class in game
A class that generates a HarvestAction so that the Actor can harvest ripe crops for food when he stands on or next to the ripe crop.
HarvestBehaviour() - Constructor for class game.HarvestBehaviour
 
hasBehaviour(Behaviours) - Method in class game.Behaviours
Check if at least one of the behaviour in the behaviours arguments exists in behaviours from the collection.
hasBullet() - Method in class game.LongRangedWeapon
Check if the long-ranged weapon has bullets left to use.
HEAL_POINT - Static variable in class game.Food
A constant that represents the health point that will be added to the Human or Player that eat the food.
healPoint - Variable in class game.ZombieIntrinsicWeapon
The health point that Zombie earns after a successful attack
healPoint() - Method in class game.ZombieIntrinsicWeapon
Getter for the health point that Zombie earns from a successful attack.
hitPoints() - Method in class game.ZombieActor
Getter for current hit point of actor
hotkey() - Method in class game.QuitGameAction
Returns the key that will be displayed in the menu and be used to trigger this action.
Human - Class in game
Class representing an ordinary human.
Human(String) - Constructor for class game.Human
Creates a Human instance object using super() constructor and add a Behaviours object consist of a list of Behaviour (AttackBehaviour, EatingBehaviour and WanderBehaviour) to protected behaviours attribute in its parent class which is the ZombieActor class.
Human(String, char, int) - Constructor for class game.Human
The protected constructor can be used to create subtypes of Human, such as the Player
HumanAttackAction - Class in game
Special class which represents action taken by alive actors (Human/Player) to attack undead actor or priestess (Zombie/Mambo Marie).

HumanAttackAction(Actor, Weapon, int) - Constructor for class game.HumanAttackAction

HumanAttackAction(Actor, Weapon, int, int) - Constructor for class game.HumanAttackAction

humansOnMap - Variable in class game.ZombieGameMapFactory
A list of names of the humans that appear on the map.
